data.title: Magadanenergo PAO Company Profile - Russia
data.text: Magadanenergo PAO is a joint stock company located in Magadan, Russia. It was established on April 13th, 1993, based on the Production association of Power and Electrification. The company has several subsidiaries, including 'Chukotenergo', which was created in 1995, and three more subsidiaries founded in April 2004. Magadanenergo's main activities include the manufacture of electric and thermal energy, the transfer of electric energy to consumers, the transfer of thermal energy on the main networks, and the selling of electric and thermal energy. The company's stocks are listed on the Russian Trading System Stock Exchange under the symbols MAGE and MAGEP since November 24, 1997.
